name: BEST WESTERN Hotel Eyde

reviews.text: When you arrive at the front door of the hotel, you have to walk right through to the back to find reception, which is rather strange. The initial impression was good, with what seemed to be modern, comfortable, refurbished areas. However, when I reached my room (32), I was very disappointed. It must have been one of the old, non-refurbished ones, with furniture that did not match, a scrathed hard-wood floor, and a bathroom which seems to have been tacked onto the room as an afterthought. I ate in the restaurant which is warm and cosy, with an old fashioned feeling. The main course was unfortunately overcooked, and pretty much burned to a cinder. The sleep quality was good in a comfortable bed. However, around 5:30 there was a commotion outside which woke me as the rubbish was collected in the car park outside my window. Breakfast is served on the top floor and was quite adecuate. If my room had been better, I would have rated this hotel a little higher.
reviews.title: Disappointing room in an otherwise nice hotel
Nice restaurant/rooms need refurb
reviews.text: Stayed for one night while on business in the area. The location is very good being so central. I had stayed here previously and can see there has been modernisation since then. As other reports say the room I had was also very basic and a bit worn out so pleasing to hear they are refurbishing. There were tea/coffee making facilities in the room which was good. Also wifi was a good speed and reliable. I ate in the restaurant and loved the food. Great menu and service. Overall the staff were very pleasant and helpful.

We can only recommend this Hotel. We stayed in the suite in June and everything was perfect during our stay (except the weather). The entire staff from the Hotel was very helpful and extremly friendly despite our many requests and questions. Many thank's to Marianne from the reception desk for arranging everything on time and greath professionalism. We'll be back !
reviews.title: Excellent location, great food and extremely friendly staff !

reviews.text: On first impressions the hotel apperas very nice and modern but as with some previous reviews it seems that I was in one of the oldest rooms in the hotel.
reviews.title: A mixed bag
Much Better than Best Westerns in the U.S.!
reviews.text: The room was quite tired and showing its age.

description: BEST WESTERN Hotel Eyde is a hotel with a long and proud history based on warm and personal service and a nostalgic atmosphere. We guarantee a unique and special experience. Visit our interesting restaurant with a high quality. Free parking and free wireless internet.
